description.value:
Values specifying the primary payer for CMS QRDA-III report submissions that groups codes from the Public Health Data Standards Consortium Source of Payment Typology (2.16.840.1.113883.3.221.5). Codes are grouped as follows:
Payer Grouping A: Medicare (1)
Payer Grouping B: Medicaid (2)
Payer Grouping C: Private Health Insurance (5), Blue Cross/Blue Shield (6)
Payer Grouping D: Other Government (3), Department of Corrections (4), Managed Care Unspecified (7), No Payment Listed (8), Miscellaneous/Other (9)
